info.name: JOKE! Make Yahoo bar BIGGER and BLINKING on Flickr
info.description: THIS IS A JOKE! This style will make the Yahoo bar BIGGER on Flickr - and it BLINKS, too! Or maybe you were looking for this one that REMOVES the Yahoo bar? http://userstyles.org/styles/90060/remove-yahoo-bar-from-flickr Check all my other Stylish scripts here. If you find this useful, you can buy me a drink! (or make a donation with the green button at the bottom of this page). ▼ To install, click "Install with Stylish" just below ▼
